pluginstrument.description:
CESSNA 414AW CHANCELLOR ALTIMETER
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Altimeter for the Cessna 414AW Chancellor by FlySimware
NOTES: - Modelled after the instrument in the Flysimware C414AW - Front bezel glass and internal reflection can be disabled in the user properties - Should work on other MSFS aircraft but compatibility not guaranteed
